fields.name: Undead (Passive):
fields.value: ** The first time you would die, live but register as dead. (You may still be executed [If this role is one of the three revealed at the beginning of the game, dead players may be executed] or killed) Your role flips as a town role. The second time you die, die for real (Flip as the Zombull this time)

fields.name: Mmm, tasty!:
fields.value: ** Attack a player with your Attack Power. You may only use this ability if noone died yesterday.
